interface.description: defines how to interact with the hub_contract for reading the exchange_rate

new_owner.description: Pending ownership transfer, awaiting acceptance by the new owner

owner.description: Account who can call certain privileged functions

yield_extract_addr.description: Address where extracted yield should be deposited

yield_extract_p.description: Percentage of yield that should be extracted (between 0 and 1)

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
